Package command

Class FullCommand

java.lang.Object
command.FullCommand
public class FullCommand
extends java.lang.Object
FullCommand class represents a command read from the command file (Debug mode). As a command, it may, in case of command hold and bet, or may not contain numbers.
Author:
Miguel Carvalho, Filipe Ferraz, Joao Baptista

  • Constructor Details

    • FullCommand

      public FullCommand​(CommandType command)
      Constructor to initialize full command object.
      Parameters:
      command - Command type of the full command.

  • Method Details

    • addNumbers

      public void addNumbers​(int[] numbers)
      This method adds numbers to a specific command. Used when the command type is Bet or Hold.
      Parameters:
      numbers - Array with the numbers that are being added to the command. In case of command type Bet, only one number is added.

    • getNumbers

      public int[] getNumbers()
      This method returns the numbers present in the full command. In case of command type Bet, only one number is returned, which represents the amount that will be bet. In case of command type Hold, the numbers returned represent the cards that are going to be hold in that round.
      Returns:
      Array of numbers.

    • hasNumbers

      public boolean hasNumbers()
      This method returns either true or false, depending on if the current full command has numbers or not.
      Returns:
      boolean true/false depending on the outcome.

    • getCommand

      public CommandType getCommand()
      This method returns the command type of the current full command.
      Returns:
      Command type of the full command.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method computes a valid representation of a full command that can be printed.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      String that uniquely identifies a given full command.
